headline: Sherwin-Williams to Announce Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results on October 28, 2025
summary: The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE: SHW) will issue a press release announcing its financial results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2025, prior to market open on Tuesday, October 28, 2025. At that time, a copy of the press release and information regarding Sherwin-Williams' financial condition, reportable segment results and other information will be available by clicking on this link Sherwin-Williams Press Releases, then clicking on the reference to the October 28 release.
